Text: I've noticed this.  Two are stuck at 99.3% and it's showing that I'm still uploading to them.  It's being weird.
Let me know which file you're not getting.  Somehow I'm betting it's the Readme file.

OK, that is truly weird.

Gk66 is version 6.6.  If you can use 6.7, which is under universal installer, you don't need that file.  It's the readme (which I kind of figured) that concerns me.  Here's the code:

Name: Basis School
Serial: 716708

This should work under all the versions.
